gateway.command-copied-message: Docker command has been copied to clipboard
gateway.docker-label: In order to run ThingsBoard IoT gateway in docker with credentials for this device you can use the following commands.
gateway.create-new-gateway-text: Are you sure you want create a new gateway with name: '{{gatewayName}}'?
gateway.configuration-delete-dialog-body:
Turning off Remote Configuration is possible only if there is physical access to the Gateway. All previous configurations will be deleted.

To turn off configuration, enter gateway name below
gateway.gateway-exists: Device with same name is already exists.
gateway.grpc-keep-alive-timeout-min: Keep alive timeout can not be less then 1
gateway.grpc-keep-alive-timeout-pattern: Keep alive timeout is not valid
gateway.grpc-keep-alive-min: Keep alive can not be less then 1
gateway.grpc-min-time-between-pings-required: Min time between pings is required
gateway.grpc-min-time-between-pings-min: Min time between pings can not be less then 1
gateway.grpc-min-time-between-pings-pattern: Min time between pings is not valid
gateway.grpc-min-ping-interval-without-data: Min ping interval without data (in ms)
gateway.grpc-min-ping-interval-without-data-requ: Min ping interval without data is required
gateway.grpc-min-ping-interval-without-data-min: Min ping interval without data can not be less then 1
gateway.grpc-min-ping-interval-without-data-patt: Min ping interval without data is not valid
gateway.grpc-max-pings-without-data-required: Max pings without data is required
gateway.grpc-max-pings-without-data-min: Max pings without data can not be less then 1
gateway.grpc-max-pings-without-data-pattern: Max pings without data is not valid
gateway.inactivity-check-period-seconds-min: Inactivity check period can not be less then 1
gateway.inactivity-check-period-seconds-pattern: Inactivity check period is not valid
gateway.inactivity-timeout-seconds-min: Inactivity timeout can not be less then 1

logs.saving-period-min: Log saving period can not be less then 1
logs.backup-count-min: Backup count can not be less then 1

gateway.min-pack-send-delay-required: Min pack send delay is required
gateway.min-pack-send-delay-min: Min pack send delay can not be less then 0

statistics.send-period-min: Statistic send period can not be less then 60
statistics.send-period-pattern: Statistic send period is not valid
statistics.check-connectors-configuration-min: Check connectors configuration can not be less then 1
statistics.check-connectors-configuration-pattern: Check connectors configuration is not valid
statistics.timeout-min: Timeout can not be less then 1

gateway.storage-max-read-record-count: Max read record count in storage
gateway.storage-max-read-record-count-required: Max Read record count is required.
gateway.storage-pack-size-required: Maximum event pack size is required.
gateway.tls-path-ca-certificate: Path to CA certificate on gateway
gateway.tls-path-client-certificate: Path to client certificate on gateway
gateway.messages-ttl-check-in-hours-required: Messages TTL check in hours is required.
gateway.messages-ttl-in-days-required: Messages TTL in days is required.
gateway.mqtt-qos-range: QoS values range is from 0 to 1
gateway.tls-path-private-key: Path to private key on gateway

hints.remote-configuration: Enables remote configuration and management of the gateway
hints.remote-shell: Enables remote control of the operating system with the gateway from the Remote Shell widget
hints.host: Hostname or IP address of ThingsBoard server
hints.port: Port of MQTT service on ThingsBoard server
hints.token: Access token for the gateway from ThingsBoard server
hints.client-id: MQTT client id for the gateway form ThingsBoard server
hints.username: MQTT username for the gateway form ThingsBoard server
hints.password: MQTT password for the gateway form ThingsBoard server
hints.data-folder: Path to folder, that will contains data (Relative or Absolute)
hints.remote-log: Enables remote logging and logs reading from the gateway
hints.backup-count: If backup count is > 0, when a rollover is done, no more than backup count files are kept - the oldest ones are deleted
hints.storage: Provides configuration for saving incoming data before it is sent to the platform
hints.max-file-count: Maximum count of file that will be created
hints.max-read-count: Count of messages to get from storage and send to ThingsBoard
hints.max-records: Maximum count of records that will be stored in one file
hints.read-record-count: Count of messages to get from storage and send to ThingsBoard
hints.max-records-count: Maximum count of data in storage before send to ThingsBoard
hints.ttl-check-hour: How often will Gateway check data for obsolescence
hints.ttl-messages-day: Maximum days that storage will save data
hints.command: The result of the command execution, will be used as the value for telemetry
hints.check-device-activity: Enables monitor the activity of each connected device
hints.inactivity-timeout: Time after whose the gateway will disconnect device
hints.minimal-pack-delay: Delay between sending packs of messages (Decreasing this setting results in increased CPU usage)
hints.qos: Quality of Service in MQTT messaging (0 - at most once, 1 - at least once)
hints.server-port: Network port on which GRPC server will listen for incoming connections.
hints.grpc-keep-alive-timeout: Maximum time the server should wait for a keepalive ping response before considering the connection dead.
hints.grpc-keep-alive: Duration between two successive keepalive ping messages when there is no active RPC call.
hints.grpc-min-time-between-pings: Minimum amount of time the server should wait between sending keepalive ping messages
hints.grpc-max-pings-without-data: Maximum number of keepalive ping messages that the server can send without receiving any data before it considers the connection dead.
hints.grpc-min-ping-interval-without-data: Minimum amount of time the server should wait between sending keepalive ping messages when there is no data being sent or received.
hints.permit-without-calls: Allow server to keep the GRPC connection alive even when there are no active RPC calls.
